00005	#exec OBJ LOAD FILE=XIIIMeshArmes.utx PACKAGE=XIIIMeshArmes
00006	
00007	
00008	class fpsbazooka extends XIIIArmes;
00009	
00010	#EXEC MESH  MODELIMPORT MESH=fpsbazookaM MODELFILE=models\fpsbazooka.PSK LODSTYLE=10
00011	#EXEC MESH  ORIGIN MESH=fpsbazookaM X=0 Y=0 Z=0 YAW=192 PITCH=0 ROLL=0
00012	
00013	#EXEC ANIM IMPORT ANIM=fpsbazookaA ANIMFILE=models\fpsbazooka.PSA COMPRESS=1 MAXKEYS=999999 IMPORTSEQS=1
00014	
00015	#EXEC MESHMAP SCALE MESHMAP=fpsbazookaM X=1.00 Y=1.00 Z=1.00
00016	#EXEC MESH    DEFAULTANIM MESH=fpsbazookaM ANIM=fpsbazookaA
00017	
00018	#EXEC ANIM DIGEST ANIM=fpsbazookaA USERAWINFO VERBOSE
00019	
00020	#EXEC MESHMAP SETTEXTURE MESHMAP=fpsbazookaM NUM=2 TEXTURE=bazooka
00021	#EXEC MESHMAP SETTEXTURE MESHMAP=fpsbazookaM NUM=1 TEXTURE=bazooka
00022	#EXEC MESHMAP SETTEXTURE MESHMAP=fpsbazookaM NUM=0 TEXTURE=fps
00023	#EXEC ANIM NOTIFY ANIM=fpsbazookaA SEQ=ReLoad TIME=0.098 FUNCTION=FPSRelNote1
00024	#EXEC ANIM NOTIFY ANIM=fpsbazookaA SEQ=ReLoad TIME=0.625 FUNCTION=FPSRelNote2
00025	#EXEC ANIM NOTIFY ANIM=fpsbazookaA SEQ=ReLoad TIME=0.694 FUNCTION=FPSRelNote3
00026	#EXEC ANIM NOTIFY ANIM=fpsbazookaA SEQ=FireAlt TIME=0.300 FUNCTION=FPSFireAltNote1
00027	#EXEC ANIM NOTIFY ANIM=fpsbazookaA SEQ=FireAlt TIME=0.600 FUNCTION=FPSFireAltNote2

00029	#EXEC ANIM NOTIFY ANIM=fpsbazookaA SEQ=WaitActVide TIME=0.148 FUNCTION=FPSFireWaitActNote1
